```
apiVersion: node.k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: RuntimeClass
metadata:
    name: kata-containers
handler: kata
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: kata-example
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
  runtimeClassName: kata-containers
```
